bibl.title: Isis, Harpocrates and the Lion-throne - an Unknown Statue in the Czartoryski Museum in Cracow.

bibl.author: BUDZANOWSKI, Mikolaj

bibl.note: Inv. XI 167. Isis lactans on lion-throne. Basalt, H. 53 cm. Provenance unknown, 1rst century B.C.
